text: Shofuso (Pine Breeze Villa), () is a Japanese house in West Fairmount Park in Philadelphia. The house is 17th century style. The house was a gift from Japan to Americans in 1953.McCarty, Yukiko Yanagida, Shoin-zukuri in Philadelphia, The East, Vol 42 No.1 P15-21 The Centennial Exposition of 1876 happened there.Fischer, Felice, “Japan and the Philadelphia Centennial Exposition” – Historic Guide to Philadelphia & Japan, p23-25 == References == Category:Gardens Category:Buildings and structures in Philadelphia Category:1954 establishments in the United States Category:Japanese culture
title: Shofuso Japanese House and Garden
